ygData.subject: Staff segments
ygData.msgSnippet: I received a staff segment from a named bandit in East Karanas along with a key.  I gave the key to the banker in HighHold Keep and received a second staff
ygData.messageBody:
I received a staff segment from a named bandit in East Karanas
along with a key. I gave the key to the banker in HighHold Keep
and received a second staff segment. I'm now stuck. Does
anyone know what to do with these segments, and what the end
result will be? All the looking I've done online just seems to
suggest that this is for a "battle staff" but no one seems to know
what to do to get it. Rumor is that Lady McCabe in HighHold Keep
may be involved.

Any and all help is appreciated. I'm getting tired of carrying them
around now that these darn things are NO DROP.

Thanks!

--Aaldiana D'Ozz

---------------------------------------------------
High Elf
Cleric
Metal Babe
HonorBound (http://mav.nu/hb)
---------------------------------------------------
